segments.text: Hello , Julia , I know a party that will begin at midnight . Would you love to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to , but my mother asks me to go home before 11:00 every night . She will worry if I get home late .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a pity ! The party is very interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no choice . My mother is always very strict with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don â€™ t complain about it . She is concerned about your safety .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right . Mother's love is the greatest love in the world .
segments.speaker: S2
